item.title: React Native - Webview communication
item.description: Introduction There are various cases in which you would want to display a Webview in a mobile app. You may want to display your privacy policy that’s present in your website, or you may want to integrate with a service that requires the use of a Webview (HelloSign) … Whatever is your usecase, you want the best User Experience. So let’s dive in and see how we can communicate back and forth between native and a Webview.
